author: Vertyco
description: Pickaxe in hand, fortune awaits. Mine rocks with your friends! This is a simple incremental-ish game where you mine rocks to earn resources that you use to upgrade your tools and thus, increase your mining efficiency.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any personal data.
install_msg: Thank you for installing! If you dont have postgres setup, use `[p]minerdb postgres` to configure the connection.
